backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining marketplace data models, storage maps, access control, and user profile operations with mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old orders and vendors to new structures by adding commissionApplied and extended vendor profile fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing various frontend pages, components, and styling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment notes detailing fixes for frontend build failures, including TypeScript config additions and Vite environment shims.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme color variables and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, theme colors, icons, and display behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styled message and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first or cache-first strategies with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing setup using TanStack Router, defining all customer, vendor, and admin routes with role-based guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: Provides an admin‑specific error boundary that logs errors and shows a diagnostic fallback UI with copyable details.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNav.t: Renders tab‑based navigation for admin sections using the current route to highlight active tabs.
frontend/src/components/admin/VendorDocu: Shows vendor documents in a dialog with loading, empty, view, and download states.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper handling vendor auto-redirect after login and rendering top navigation, content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied screen with optional admin‑assignment, diagnostics, and access‑refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Simple wrapper that requires authentication for admin pages and redirects unauthenticated users while showing a loading state during initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles clearing queries after logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter profile details and saves them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Wraps children with role-based access control, handling admin/vendor/customer checks and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/SafeAdminGa: Empty placeholder file defining no functionality.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar that switches menu items based on user role and displays cart badge and active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: A styled wrapper around the base Button component applying a primary gradient style.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Product deal card showing image, pricing, discount, and deal type badge with link to product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input component with floating label behavior using peer-based styling.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto-rotating banner slider with manual navigation buttons and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Displays a responsive product grid with images, pricing, discounts, stock status, and add‑to‑cart handling, with skeletons for loading states.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Shows an order status badge using helper functions to determine label and styling.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements the main site navigation bar with search, role‑aware actions, cart count, mobile drawer, and branding.
frontend/src/components/vendor/EditOutle: Dialog allowing vendors to edit outlet details, manage photo uploads, and submit updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorTab: Renders vendor navigation tabs with icons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Exports sample vendor data and a VendorData interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Exposes actor query status by subscribing to React Query's cache without recreating the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity persistence, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and other backend data using an actor and identity context.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light/dark modes, including color system, shadows, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission text and feature cards highlighting platform benefits.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Fetches and displays admin analytics including vendors, orders, sales, and commission data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation, control panel cards for vendor and order management, and quick action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays and filters orders by city, allows updating order status, and shows order details in a table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides an interface to add, edit, and delete products using dialogs and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Manages vendors with approval, rejection, outlet status toggling, payment marking, and document viewing.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart with product details, price calculations, and checkout handling based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Lists all product categories with loading skeletons and styled image cards linking to category pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays products for a given category with sorting options and filtering by active status.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items and submits an order after validating identity and cart state.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with basic validation and static contact details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer’s profile details including principal, name, email, phone, and address.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists the customer's orders with status badges and basic order details, showing a loading or empty state when applicable.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays the user's wishlist by fetching wishlist IDs and matching products, showing loading skeletons, empty state, and product cards with discounts and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage with hero slider, login buttons, deal products, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation and saves the data before navigating to the vendor list filtered by city.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects outlet details including photo upload and validates inputs before saving and navigating to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a simple vendor dashboard summarizing vendor and outlet details after onboarding, including outlet photo and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Displays a list of vendors filtered by selected city, with empty states and navigation to vendor shop pages.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Handles vendor login with form validation and saves login data before navigating to outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays vendor details or a not-found message, with navigation back to vendor listings.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, image carousel, pricing, reviews, and supports adding to cart and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Shows vendor dashboard stats, wallet alerts, and sales summaries with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Lists vendor orders with status, dates, and totals, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Manages vendor products with create, edit, and delete functionality using a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProfileP: Displays vendor profile and outlet details with edit support and verification status.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorWalletPa: Shows wallet due, sales, and commission with alerts for limit thresholds.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Maps category IDs to deterministic gradient color classes via a hash.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Provides case-insensitive lookup of a category by name.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Helpers to extract readable messages from unknown errors and build diagnostics text blocks.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats bigint or number amounts into INR strings with ₹ and localized formatting.
frontend/src/utils/maskAadhaar.ts: Masks Aadhaar numbers to show only the last four digits.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: SessionStorage helpers for saving, retrieving, and clearing customer, vendor, and outlet onboarding data.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Safe conversion and formatting utilities for bigint and numbers to avoid non-finite values.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to class names and labels, plus availability status helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Vite environment type definitions including optional VITE_II_URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Node-specific TypeScript config for Vite with strict options and no emission.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config for React with path aliasing, env shims, chunk splitting, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata covering wallet rules, outlet behavior, UI requirements, and feature tracking.
